segments.text: Are you doing the football pools , Brian ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I ’ Ve nearly finished , June . I ’ m sure we will win something this week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You always say that , but we never win anything ! What will you do if you win a lot of money ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I win a lot of money , I shall buy you a mink coat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t want a mink coat ! I want to see the world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . If we win a lot of money , we shall travel around the world and we shall stay at the best hotels . Then we will return home and buy a big house in the country . We will have a beautiful
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But if we spend all that money we shall be poor again . What will we do then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If we spend all the money , we will try and win the football pools again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s a pleasant dream , but everything depends on if !
segments.speaker: S1
